schema.description: 工单创建时间, 配合EndDate使用, 用于查询在指定的开始和结束时间范围内创建的工单
工单创建截止时间, 配合StartDate使用, 用于查询在指定的开始和结束时间范围内提交的工单
工单关键词, 用于模糊搜索匹配工单创建时的Description字段的内容

items.description: 工单状态,参考值如下1,"assigned","待响应",2,"dealing","处理中",3,"wait-feedback","待反馈",4,"feedback","已反馈",5,"wait_confirm","待确认",6,"confirmed","已完成"

RequestId.description: 接口请求的唯一ID, 每次调用requestID唯一

Success.description: 调用接口返回是否成功, true代表调用正常

Message.description: 错误信息, 当success=false的时候, 可以取到message

PageSize.description: 分页查询参数的每页条数

TotalCount.description: 查询结果总数, 即我的工单记录总条数

Data.description: 返回值为我的工单列表数据

Status.description:
工单状态, 参考值如下
1, "assigned", "待响应", 
2, "dealing", "处理中",
3, "wait_feedback", "待反馈",
4, "feedback", "已反馈",
5, "wait_confirm", "待确认",
6, "confirmed", "已完成"

Label.description: 状态描述, 如已完成

Value.description: 状态值, 如6, 代表已完成

401.errorMessage: You are not authorized to perform the operation.

500.errorMessage: An error occurred while processing your request.

responseDemo: [{"type":"json","example":"{ "RequestId": "AC0AB2EC-AFBC-44BA-AE77-132A5A1EC0AD", "Success": true, "Code": 0, "Message": "入参解析失败", "PageNumber": 1, "PageSize": 10, "TotalCount": 99, "Data": [ { "TicketId": "0005PYGCW", "Title": "ecs续费失败啥原因", "Status": { "Label": "已完成", "Value": "6" } } ] }","errorExample":""},{"type":"xml","example":"99 10 入参解析失败 AC0AB2EC-AFBC-44BA-AE77-132A5A1EC0AD 1 0005PYGCW ecs续费失败啥原因 6 0 true","errorExample":""}]
title: 获取我的工单列表
